bit_field.name: HT
bit_field.description: Minimum hold time[3:0]

bit_field.name: PriPort0
bit_field.description: Priority value of the first slave port. The value written into this location is the value that you want to assign the first slave port.

bit_field.name: PriPort1
bit_field.description: 2nd port priority value.

bit_field.name: PriPort2
bit_field.description: 3rd port priority value.

bit_field.name: PriPort3
bit_field.description: 4th port priority value.

bit_field.name: PriPort4
bit_field.description: 5th port priority value.

bit_field.name: PriPort5
bit_field.description: 6th port priority value.

bit_field.name: PriPort6
bit_field.description: 7th port priority value.

bit_field.name: PriPort7
bit_field.description: Priority value of the eighth port. The value written into this location is the value that you want to assign the eighth slave port.

bit_field.name: ATDATA0
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATDATAS[0]; Set the value of ATDATAM[0]

bit_field.name: ATDATA7
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATDATAS[7]; Set the value of ATDATAM[7]

bit_field.name: ATDATA15
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATDATAS[15]; Set the value of ATDATAM[15]

bit_field.name: ATDATA23
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATDATAS[23]; Set the value of ATDATAM[23]

bit_field.name: ATDATA31
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATDATAS[31]; Set the value of ATDATAM[31]

bit_field.name: ATREADY
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATREADYM; Set the value of ATREADYS

bit_field.name: AFVALID
bit_field.description: Read the value of AFVALIDM; Set the value of AFVALIDS

bit_field.name: ATID
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATIDS; Set the value of ATIDM

bit_field.name: ATVALID
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATVALIDS; Set the value of ATVALIDM

bit_field.name: AFREADY
bit_field.description: Read the value of AFREADYS; Set the value of AFREADYM

bit_field.name: ATBYTES
bit_field.description: Read the value of ATBYTESS; Set the value of ATBYTESM

bit_field.name: IntegrationMode
bit_field.description: Integration mode. When set, the component enters integration mode, enabling topology detection or integration testing to be performed. At reset the component must enter functional mode. If no integration functionality is implemented, this bit must read as zero.

bit_field.name: CLAIMSET
bit_field.description: A bit programmable register bank which sets the Claim Tag Value.

bit_field.name: CLAIMCLR
bit_field.description: A bit programmable register bank that is zero at reset.

bit_field.name: WriteAccessCode
bit_field.description: Write Access Code. A write of 0xC5ACCE55 enables further write access to this device. An invalid write will have the affect of removing write access.

bit_field.name: IMP
bit_field.description: Lock mechanism is implemented. When PADDRDBG31 is HIGH, the Lock Status Register reads as 0x0 indicating that no lock exists. When PADDRDBG31 is LOW, the Lock Status Register reads as 0x3 from reset. This indicates a 32-bit lock access mechanism is present and is locked

bit_field.name: STATUS
bit_field.description: Lock Status. This bit is HIGH when the device is locked, and LOW when unlocked.

bit_field.name: s8BIT
bit_field.description: Access Lock Register size. This bit reads 0 to indicate 32-bit register is present.

bit_field.name: AuthenticationStatus
bit_field.description: Authentication Status. Reports the required security level. This is set to 0x00 for functionality not implemented.

bit_field.name: PORTCOUNT
bit_field.description: This is the value of the Verilog define PORTCOUNT and represents the number of input ports connected. By default all 8 ports are connected. 0x0 and 0x1 are illegal values.

bit_field.name: PriorityScheme
bit_field.description: The CSTF implements a static priority scheme.

bit_field.name: MajorType
bit_field.description: Major Type and Class. A value of 0x12 identifies this device as a trace link (0x2).

bit_field.name: SubType
bit_field.description: Sub Type. A value of 0x12 identifies this device specifically as a funnel/router (0x1).

bit_field.name: JEP106
bit_field.description: JEP106 continuation code.

bit_field.name: c4KB
bit_field.description: 4KB Count

bit_field.name: PartNumber
bit_field.description: Part Number [7:0]

bit_field.name: PartNumber
bit_field.description: Part Number [11:8]

bit_field.name: JEP106_identity_code
bit_field.description: JEP106 identity code [3:0]

bit_field.name: JEP106_identity_code
bit_field.description: JEP106 identity code [6:4]

bit_field.name: CustomerModified
bit_field.description: Customer Modified.

bit_field.name: ComponentClass
bit_field.description: Component class

bit_field_value.name: CIDR1_ComponentClass_0b1111
bit_field_value.description: PrimeCell of system component with no standardized register layout, for backward compatibility.
